snippet: The Dow Jones industrial average also sets a record as the market experiences gains across sectors.
abstract: Stock market surges, pushing the Standard & Poor's 500-stock index and Dow Jones industrial average to new record highs.
lead_paragraph: The Dow Jones industrial average also sets a record as the market experiences gains across sectors.

headline.main: Indexes Gain Broadly, Led by Technology
headline.print_headline: Indexes Gain Broadly, Led by Technology
